name: BlockIpAddress
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3z R2-2 and will not work in earlier versions!
tips: Wildcards can be used with this function, for example blocking the IP '6.9.*.*' will block all IPs where the first two octets are 6 and 9 respectively. Any number can be in place of an asterisk.
description: Blocks an IP address from further communication with the server for a set amount of time (with wildcards allowed). Players trying to connect to the server with a blocked IP address will receive the generic "You are banned from this server." message. Players that are online on the specified IP before the block will timeout after a few seconds and, upon reconnect, will receive the same message.

params_body.name: timems
params_body.description: The time (in milliseconds) that the connection will be blocked for. 0 can be used for an indefinite block.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
UnBlockIpAddress: Unblock an IP that was previously blocked.
 OnIncomingConnection: Called when a player is attempting to connect to the server.
